titleInfo.title: Wendy Bagwell and the Sunliters at Emerald Downs (16891)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy and red on white) announcing Wendy Bagwell and the Sunliters, Bob Allen and Bluegrass Gospel Boys, the Old Dominion Gospel Singers, Ronnie Davitt, The Journeymen, and Cousin Ray at Emerald Downs on September 21. Poster features a metal photoplate of Wendy Bagwell and the Sunliters. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40302.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
